options.description: set video size (default "320x240")
options.name: size

options.description: set video rate (default "25")
options.name: rate

options.description: set video duration (default -0.000001)
options.name: duration

options.description: set video sample aspect ratio (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1/1)
options.name: sar

options.description: set LUT precision (from 4 to 16) (default 10)
options.name: precision

options.description: set X-axis offset (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: xo

options.description: set Y-axis offset (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: yo

options.description: set T-axis offset (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: to

options.description: set 0-order phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: k0

options.description: set 1-order X-axis phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kx

options.description: set 1-order Y-axis phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: ky

options.description: set 1-order T-axis phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kt

options.description: set X-axis*T-axis product phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kxt

options.description: set Y-axis*T-axis product phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kyt

options.description: set X-axis*Y-axis product phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kxy

options.description: set 2-order X-axis phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kx2

options.description: set 2-order Y-axis phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: ky2

options.description: set 2-order T-axis phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kt2

options.description: set 0-order U-color phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: ku

options.description: set 0-order V-color phase (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)
options.name: kv
